claim.vclaim-sno-zoo-name-cockroach-feed-preda: As part of its annual fundraiser, San Antonio Zoo in Texas is offering scorned lovers the chance to name a cockroach or rodent after their ex before it is fed to a larger animal.
claim.vclaim-sno-zookeeper-arrested-molest-gor: A 29-year-old San Diego Zoo intern was arrested and charged with attempting sexually assault a gorilla.
claim.vclaim-sno-zoom-teachers-mute: Zoom allows hosts of meetings, such as educators, to hear participants whose microphones are turned off.
claim.vclaim-sno-zuckerberg-dont-share-hoaxes: Mark Zuckerberg is giving $1,000 away to Facebook users who refrain from sharing hoaxes.
claim.vclaim-sno-zuckerberg-facebook-ireland-a: Mark Zuckerberg admitted or bragged that Facebook banned pro-life advertising, in particular, during Ireland's 2018 abortion-referendum campaign.
claim.vclaim-sno-zuckerberg-removing-pages: Mark Zuckerberg will delete Donald Trump's or Hillary Clinton's Facebook pages for 500,000 likes.
